bibl.note: Excavations conducted by the Monash University, Melbourne. - Ismant el-Kharab. Area B/3/1-2: The 'Villa' and the Pigeon Loft (Roman Period). - Mut el-Kharab. The Temple Area (Early Dynastic Period - Mamluk Period).
bibl.seg: HOPE Colin A., Gillian E. BOWEN, Wendy DOLLING, Caroline HUBSCHMANN, Paul KUCERA, Richard LONG and Anna STEVENS, Report on the Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab and Mut el-Kharab in 2006.
